availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis Manville Webster (Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, attorney. New York native. Son of Waite Webster and Sarah Manville Webster. Married to Anna Eliza Swiney Webster in 1843. Father of Adlee Webster, S. Nazarine Webster, F Gertrude Webster, York Webster, Kate Webster, and Ann Webster. Attorney in Campbell County, Kentucky in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Campbell County in 1850. Attorney in Campbell County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Campbell County in 1860.
